text: The Bar-Kays is an American funk-R&B-soul; band. They started in 1966 in Memphis, Tennessee. Many of their songs were on record charts from the 1960s to the 1980s. The songs included "Anticipation", "Son of Shaft" and "Boogie Body Land". The list of group members has changed several times. title: The Bar-Kays
